mapper.insert: insert into d_edite (id, editor, target, kind, islock, create_time,update_time) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{editor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{target,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{islock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update d_edite set editor = #{editor,jdbcType=INTEGER}, target = #{target,jdbcType=INTEGER}, kind = #{kind,jdbcType=INTEGER}, islock = #{islock,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=BIGINT}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=BIGINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
